mapper.select:
-- SELECT A.DGEM_DT AS DGEM_DT , A.DGEM_TM AS DGEM_TM , A.STDT_NO AS STDT_NO , ABSV.DECR(B.STDT_NM) AS STDT_NM , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('SEX_CD' , B.SEX_CD ) AS SEX_CD , ABSV.FN_GETAGE(B.BITH_DT) AS AGE_YCNT , G.LOC_NM AS EORG_LOC_NM , A.DGEM_HIST_SEQ AS DGEM_HIST_SEQ , A.DGEM_IDX AS DGEM_IDX , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('DGEM_STAT_CD', A.DGEM_STAT_CD) AS DGEM_STAT_CD , A.DGEM_SMRY_CNTN AS DGEM_SMRY_CNTN, A.DGEM_STAT_CNTN AS DGEM_STAT_CNTN, A.LOC_HIST_NO AS LOC_HIST_NO , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('ACT_DIV_CD' , A.ACT_DIV_CD ) AS ACT_DIV_CD , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('HBIT_STAT_CD', A.HBIT_STAT_CD)||' 편' AS HBIT_STAT_CD , F.HBIT_MDAN AS HBIT_MDAN , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('PLC_CLSS_CD' , E.PLC_CLSS_CD ) AS PLC_CLSS_CD , E.LOC_NM AS LOC_NM , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('TEMP_STAT_CD', A.TEMP_STAT_CD)||(CASE WHEN A.TEMP_STAT_CD LIKE 'V%' THEN '(추정)' ELSE ' 편' END) AS TEMP_STAT_CD , F.TEMP_VAL AS TEMP_VAL , A.JUDG_NO AS JUDG_NO , A.RMRK AS RMRK , A.DGEM_ALAM_NO AS DGEM_ALAM_NO , D.GUAR_NO AS GUAR_NO , ABSV.DECR(D.GUAR_NM) AS GUAR_NM , ABSV.DECR(D.GUAR_TEL_NO) AS GUAR_TEL_NO
FROM ABSV.TS_STDT_DGEM_HIST A
LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TM_STDT_BASE B ON B.STDT_NO = A.STDT_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TM_STDT_GUAR_CONN C ON C.STDT_NO = B.STDT_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TM_GUAR_BASE D ON D.GUAR_NO = C.GUAR_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TS_STDT_LOC_HIST E ON E.LOC_HIST_NO = A.LOC_HIST_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TD_JUDG_BASE F ON F.JUDG_NO = A.JUDG_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSV.TS_LOC_INFO_BASE G ON G.LOC_NO = B.EORG_LOC_NO
WHERE 1=1
AND A.DGEM_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{entrDtFr},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{entrDtTo},'-','')
AND A.DGEM_STAT_CD = #{dgemStatCd}
AND C.GUAR_NO = #{guarNo}::numeric
AND D.GUAR_NM = ABSV.ENCR(#{guarNm})
AND A.HBIT_STAT_CD = #{hbitStatCd}
AND A.TEMP_STAT_CD = #{tempStatCd}
AND A.PLC_CLSS_CD = #{plcClssCd}
AND A.STDT_NO = #{stdtNo}::numeric
AND B.STDT_NM = ABSV.ENCR(#{stdtNm})
AND G.LOC_NM LIKE '%'||#{locNm}||'%'
ORDER BY A.DGEM_DT DESC, A.DGEM_TM DESC, A.STDT_NO, A.DGEM_HIST_SEQ DESC
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
